item.title: Poor Manâ€™s GSM BTS :: Nuandâ€™s BladeRF & OpenBTS 5 Setup Instructions

item.title: Enable FaceTime on Your Middle-eastern iPhone/iPad
item.description: I was stuck with an iPhone purchased in the middle-east where Apple blocks FaceTime â€“ Turns out that its just a matter of Carrier Bundles â€“ Apple , from iOS 7 , started signing the carrier bundles , so they couldnâ€™t be modified by end-customers , any modification would result in change of the signature with the modification over-written on reboot with a standard bundle. A developer team from china enabled modifications by releasing a com-center patch that allows an over-ride for the signature check.

item.title: Mbuni â€“ MM7 :: Interconnectivity with Operator
item.description: Was playing around with Mbuni for a friend of mine , who wanted to use it as a VASP gateway and interconnect it with an operator over MM7. Spent a little while configuring it and thought of posting the configs here for anyone whoâ€™s trying to achieve a similar configuration. Mbuni consits of MMS Relay MMS Proxy MMS From Email MMSbox For this sepecific purpose , only MMSBOX is required.

item.title: Playing Around with Infobright
item.description: Hi, I wanted a way to quickly pick , loadup and analyze tickets from our IN platform, ( weâ€™re talking about 1.3 Mil + rows for one file in peak hours ) Waseem [ http://convergence.pk ] , was kind enough to spare some time for the setup and we ended up with infobright [ http://infobright.com ] community edition. Infobrightâ€™s based on MySQL and uses knowledge base + vertical coloums , which end up making queries run ridiculously fast.

item.title: Reverse SSH Tunnel
Mobilink Wimax
item.description: Hereâ€™s my post / first review of Mobilink Infinity , A new WiMax service by Mobilink GSM in Pakistan. I just subscribed to Mobilink Infinity for 1Mbps connection. The installers came over and installed it , the over all installation experience was okay , apart from the fact that they donâ€™t provide you the CPE password , so you cannot do any port mapping / port forwarding, so had to fight with them to get the access.
